questions.title: React Timer Component
questions.description: Create a React component named Timer that displays a countdown timer. The component should accept an initialSeconds prop. It should decrement by 1 every second until it reaches 0. Provide a 'Reset' button to restart the timer to the initial value.

questions.title: User List Filter
questions.description: Create a component `UserList` that accepts a `users` prop (array of objects with `name` and `role`). Render a text input to filter the list by name (case-insensitive). Display the filtered users in an unordered list. Each list item should display the name and role.

questions.title: Toggle Button
questions.description: Create a `ToggleButton` component that toggles between 'ON' and 'OFF' states when clicked. It should verify the click handling logic.
